description:
Speaker: Kojo Idrissa

Spreadsheets are often used to share interesting & important data. I'll show you how to use OpenPyXL to work with that data in a way that's better than using .csv files. I'll also discuss common problems in working with spreadsheets via code. I first spoke on this in 2013, thus the title.

From: PyCascades 2018 in Vancouver, BC, Canada

Recorded by: Elaine at http://jollygoodrecordings.ca
title: Kojo Idrissa Python & Spreadsheets: Canadian Edition
